value:
$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You've come to kill him, admit it!
TRAITOR!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Please, Brother, do as you please.
You are king, after all. I will handle
this rabble.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|Urrgh... Uuwagh!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Fáfnir, no! Wait!$k$p$EFace_Anger|Why, Ótr? Why aren't you trying
to stop him?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Explain this, Ótr! What has become
of Fáfnir? What did this?!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|This is one of the gifts of the Crown
of the Dvergar. It possesses any who
wear it—any who it judges unworthy.$k$pThe crown makes a ruin of their
mind and body, protecting the
kingdom from would-be usurpers.$k$pThat fact is what allowed the royal
family to rule for generation after
generation.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Y-you knew this would happen?!$k$pWhy didn't you stop it?!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Stop it? ...Why would I?$k$pWithout the Crown of the Dvergar,
my beloved brother might have
regained control of his mind.$k$p$EFace_Pain|And then...then he might remember
where he came from! He'd seek out
the summoner for help, and—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|How does this have anything to do
with $Nu?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...No. It can't be! But if— Hmm...
Aha. I see... Then Fáfnir is—$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|He was summoned during one of
Eitri's experiments.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Fáfnir is...from another world?!
Like...a Hero?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|My brother is everything to me,
you see. I cannot live without him!$k$pAnd yet...he still searches for the
home he should have forgotten
long ago...$k$p$EFace_Smile|I hope to make something clear
to him.$k$pNo matter what he does, he has
no other place to go. He is already
home—with me.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What are you talking about?! He has
to get back to his world as soon as
possible! Let us help!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...Have you not been listening?
Fáfnir is not going anywhere!$k$pLook for yourself! He's finally
forgotten about those things
that matter so little.$k$pLike where he's from—and who
you are, Reginn.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Isn't that wonderful?! Finally, I am
what matters, and I alone!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ótr, no...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Heh heh heh haahhh...$k$pAh, but I mustn't let my guard down
just yet...$k$pFirst, I need to make sure everyone
but me—you all, that is—is dead.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Of course you understand that
I cannot rest easy while the
summoner still lives.$k$pI have no need of a weapon that
can destroy gates if I destroy the
source of the gates themselves!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...It seems the time for talk has
passed. Princess Reginn, are you
prepared for what comes next?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|...I'm ready!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Let's go, $Nu!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Urgh... Not done...yet.
I can...still fight!$k$p
